faqs.question: How long does migration take?
faqs.answer: Migration completes within 24–72 hours for most SMEs. Timeline depends on data volume and business complexity. The migration team will share the exact estimate after the audit.

faqs.question: Will existing reports and ledgers stay intact?
faqs.answer: All ledgers, vouchers, invoices, contacts, and balances transfer cleanly. Data structure, accuracy, and historical records are preserved.

faqs.question: Any downtime during migration?
faqs.answer: Zero downtime during transition. Daily accounting operations continue without disruption or access issues.

faqs.question: Does Giddh support Tally data migration?
faqs.answer: Support for Tally, Busy, Zoho, Marg, Excel sheets, and CSV formats. Complete guided onboarding for a smooth transition.
